description:
THE REAL DRIFTING SIMULATOR
· CarX Drift Racing Online provides a unique experience handling sports cars with simple and the intuitive control
· If you like drifting, prepare to spend hours playing and enjoying this game
· Use the handbrake to send your car sideways
· Paint donuts burning tires
· Cut through clouds of smoke on high speed 

CARS AND TUNING
· Enjoy an insane feeling driving powerful sports cars
· Check out unique driving on different terrain: asphalt, grass & sand
· Drive 70+  racing cars
· Choose among available setups: Turbo, Racing, Drift, Ultimate

CUSTOMIZATION
· Shuffle through over 100 bodykits or customize your own with 1000+ parts available
· Paint your car different colors and create unique vinyls with in-game tools

ONLINE & XDS MODES
· Compete against other players in online rooms (up to 16 players)
· Take part in XDS-based championships
· Tandem drift with friends
· Enjoy live cams and marvelous replays
name: CarX Drift Racing Online
